control_attributes.Control: SC-7 (22) SEPARATE SUBNETS FOR CONNECTING TO DIFFERENT SECURITY DOMAINS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements separate network addresses (i.e., different subnets) to connect to systems in different security domains.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system provides a trusted communications path that is logically isolated and distinguishable from other paths.

Control Statement: The information system implements separate network addresses (i.e., different subnets) to connect to systems in different security domains.
Control Name: SC-7 (22) SEPARATE SUBNETS FOR CONNECTING TO DIFFERENT SECURITY DOMAINS
